Package com.travelbank.knit.schedulers.heavy

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HeavyTaskScheduler
    This is a SchedulerInterface that is meant to handle heavy weight tasks such as downloading large files/images.
    HeavyTaskScheduler.AvailableThread
    Wrapper class that holds a thread id and the type of the thread.
    HeavyThread
    Base class for all threads in HeavyTaskScheduler pool.
    HThread1
    A HeavyThread inside the thread pool of HeavyTaskScheduler.
    HThread2
    A HeavyThread inside the thread pool of HeavyTaskScheduler.
    HThread3
    A HeavyThread inside the thread pool of HeavyTaskScheduler.
    HThread4
    A HeavyThread inside the thread pool of HeavyTaskScheduler.
    TaskPackage
    This class contains everything that a HeavyThread needs to perform a task.
